Name: Statuette of Harpocrates
Description: Statuette of a seated Harpocrates (Horus the Child), naked, with the left arm close to the body and the right arm bent, raising the index finger to the mouth.  His head is shaved, he has a youth lock at the right temple and an uraeus on the forehead. He is wearing a semispherical skullcap and there is an amulet around his neck.
